author: Barry Roche
title: Man remanded on bail after being charged with ‘unlawfully seizing’ a car in Cork
description: Gardaí allege accused forcibly removed 17-year-old from vehicle and taking car keys
content:
A 25-year-old man has been remanded on bail after he was charged with hijacking a car belonging to a 17-year-old in Co Cork over the Easter weekend.
Kevin Liney from Beechwood Avenue, Cluain Ard, Cobh was charged with unlawfully seizing a car by force at Har… [+2378 chars]
